title: Nicole Knows Support Is Not Just For Breasts with Grace Edwards & Amy Aniobi
description: Hello! You look good and thriving! Welcome to another episode of Besting Everybody? Besting Ourselves?!? Besting Each Other with Grace Edwards & Amy Aniobi! Grace shares how well black people are treated in Portugal, how much she admires Amy’s inclusive leadership skills, gassing your best friend UP, and wanting more morning cocktails with your best friend. Amy tells stories of wonderful hot toddies, being the friend who schedules, printing directions in case of zombie apocalypse, and what's the word for expressing interest in a job? Submission? Let us know. Reunited, Grace and Amy remember connecting over cocktails, loving your friend’s titties, and BFF EGOTs.
author: fanmail+bestfriends@earwolf.com (Earwolf)
